abstract: Links to interviews, résumés and papers related to Christopher Sims and Thomas Sargent, the winners of the 2011 Nobel in economics.
snippet: Links to interviews, résumés and papers related to Christopher Sims and Thomas Sargent, the winners of the 2011 Nobel in economics.
lead_paragraph: The spotlight today is on Christopher A. Sims of Princeton University and Thomas J. Sargent of New York University, the winners of the Bank of Sweden Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel.

headline.main: Further Reading on the Nobel Economics Laureates
